subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: A Brazilian prosecutor warned the Ferrari driver Felipe Massa that he could be arrested and face a prison sentence of up to six years if he takes orders to help his teammate Fernando Alonso win the Formula One title.
snippet: A Brazilian prosecutor warned the Ferrari driver Felipe Massa that he could be arrested and face a prison sentence of up to six years if he takes orders to help his teammate Fernando Alonso win the Formula One title.
